mapper.select: SELECT count(SCHEDULE_NO) FROM SCHEDULE WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} and SCHEDULE_NO = #{schedule_no} and ( (SCHEDULE_END - SYSDATE) >1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET SCHEDULE_NAME = 'Del Request' , SCHEDULE_CONTENT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mm:ss') WHERE MEM_NO=#{mem_no} AND SCHEDULE_NO=#{schedule_no}
